song.title: Global Trash 2 (Official Version)
song.info:
This is the official version, remastered from the original master tape.
"Global Trash 2 has been shown at computer conferences all over Europe and has been shown on MTV Europe several times. It helped give birth to a new scene called WILD Demos in 1991. Global Trash 2 was the first video demo to hit the demo scene, setting a new standard in demo's and videos."
